item.title: OECD Expert workshop on Economic Modelling of Climate and Related Tipping Points
item.description: Emerging evidence highlights the increasing risks of non-linearities and systemic changes caused by climate change. These include large-scale tipping points in the earth’s climate such as the disintegration of the Greenland and West Antarctic Ice Sheets, permafrost collapse, and the breakdown of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation among others.
